Package com.patiun.library.dao

Interface UserDao

All Superinterfaces:
Dao<User>
All Known Implementing Classes:
UserDaoImpl
public interface UserDao extends Dao<User>
This interface is concerned with manipulating Users' blocked states and finding their entries in the database by login and password

  • Method Summary

    Method
    Description

    Searches the database for a User with the same login

  • Method Details

    • findUserByLoginAndPassword

      Optional<User> findUserByLoginAndPassword(String login, String password) throws DaoException
      Searches the database for a User with the same login-password pair
      Parameters:
      login - String value representing the login to search by
      password - String value representing the password to search by
      Returns:
      Optional.empty() if there is no such user. Otherwise, returns Optional object containing found User
      Throws:
      DaoException - if there were errors connecting to the database or while executing an SQL script

    • findUserByLogin

      Optional<User> findUserByLogin(String login) throws DaoException
      Searches the database for a User with the same login
      Parameters:
      login - String value representing the login to search by
      Returns:
      Optional.empty() if there is no such user. Otherwise, returns Optional object containing found User
      Throws:
      DaoException - if there were errors connecting to the database or while executing an SQL script

    • saveWithPassword

      void saveWithPassword(User user, String password) throws DaoException
      Saves the user, along with the inputted password
      Parameters:
      user - User to be saved
      password - the User's password
      Throws:
      DaoException - if there were errors connecting to the database or while executing an SQL script

    • updateUserBlocked

      void updateUserBlocked(Long id, boolean newValue) throws DaoException
      Sets a new value for a User in the database
      Parameters:
      id - Long value representing the id of the User in the database
      newValue - boolean value to set is_blocked column value to
      Throws:
      DaoException - if there were errors connecting to the database or while executing an SQL script
